      • gameModel

        private final GameModel gameModel
        The reference to he game model (central unit which contains rules of the game)

      • loginTimer

        private final java.util.Timer loginTimer
        The timer for login phase. It is started after the third player logins.

      • loginTimerStarted

        private boolean loginTimerStarted
        A support boolean to keep track of the starting of the login timer

      • timers

        private java.util.Map<Observer,​java.util.Timer> timers
        A map to keep the input timer for each player. The timer is started only when a player has to do something and it is restarted after any interaction.

      • loginTimerDuration

        private int loginTimerDuration
        The dafault duratrion of the login timer. It is overidden by the configFile and by the arguments from terminal

      • inputTimerDuration

        private int inputTimerDuration
        The dafault duratrion of the iput timer. It is overidden by the configFile and by the arguments from terminal

      • toDisconnectList

        private java.util.List<ServerView> toDisconnectList
        The list of server views set to disconnect.

      • serverViews

        private java.util.List<ServerView> serverViews
        The list of all server views

      • logger

        private static final java.util.logging.Logger logger

        Builds the controller, initializing its attributes
        Parameters:
        gameModel - sets the game model to control

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • login

        public void login​(java.lang.String name,
                  ServerView serverView)
        Creates a player and adds it to the match. Before adding checks if the name is valid.
        Parameters:
        name - teh name of the player
        serverView - the corresponding server view (observer of the model)

      • squareSelected

        public void squareSelected​(int selection,
                           ServerView serverView)
        Manages the selection of a square by a player. According to the state of the player, calls a proper method on the model to update it.
        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the square among the list of selectable squares of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

      • actionSelected

        public void actionSelected​(int selection,
                           ServerView serverView)
        Manages the selection of an action by a player. According to the state of the player, calls a proper method on the model to update it.
        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the action among the list of selectable actions of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

      • playerSelected

        public void playerSelected​(int selection,
                           ServerView serverView)
        Manages the selection of a player by a player. According to the state of the player, calls a proper method on the model to update it.
        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the player among the list of selectable players of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

      • weaponSelected

        public void weaponSelected​(int selection,
                           ServerView serverView)
        Manages the selection of a weapon by a player. According to the state of the player, calls a proper method on the model to update it.
        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the weapon among the list of selectable weapons of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the mode among the list of selectable modes of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the command among the list of selectable commands of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

      • colorSelected

        public void colorSelected​(int selection,
                          ServerView serverView)
        Manages the selection of a color by a player. According to the state of the player, calls a proper method on the model to update it.
        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the color among the list of selectable colors of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

      • powerUpSelected

        public void powerUpSelected​(int selection,
                            ServerView serverView)
        Manages the selection of a powerup by a player. According to the state of the player, calls a proper method on the model to update it.
        Parameters:
        selection - the index of the powerup among the list of selectable powerups of the player
        serverView - the server view corresponding to the player which has made the selection

      • disconnectPlayer

        public void disconnectPlayer​(ServerView serverView)
        Disconnects the server view and its corresponding player. When a player is disconnected remains in the match (can receive damages), but skips his turns.
        Parameters:
        serverView - the server view to disconnect

      • checkStopMatch

        private boolean checkStopMatch()
        Checks if there are to few players and the match has to be stopped.
        Returns:
        true if the match has to be stopped

      • startMatch

        public void startMatch()
        Starts the match

      • checkStart

        private void checkStart()
        Checks if the match has to be started (there are 5 players) or could start, because there are at least 3 players. In this case it starts the login timer.

      • getGameModel

        public GameModel getGameModel()
        Gets the game model
        Returns:
        the reference to the game model

      • setLoginTimerStarted

        public void setLoginTimerStarted()
        Sets the flag of the login timer to false

      • finalCleaning

        public void finalCleaning()
        It is the final control done after every player's interaction and update of model. Disconnect all the players set to disconnect. Checks if the player from which an interaction is expected are actually online. If this is not the case, their action is simulated. Finally it starts the timeout for players online from which an interaction is required.

      • addTimer

        private void addTimer​(Observer observer)
        Adds the input timer for a server view, only if no one was already present
        Parameters:
        observer - the server view involved by the timer

      • removeTimer

        private void removeTimer​(Observer observer)
        Removes and stops the timer for a server view
        Parameters:
        observer - the server view to which the timer belonged

      • selectionError

        private void selectionError​(Observer observer)
        Notifies and updates observers in case of a selection error. This kind of error should never be possible in normal conditions, because a player can only selects among the selectable items sent by the model.
        Parameters:
        observer - the server view responsible of the error
